kickstart.post:
import stack.grub
makegrub = stack.grub.App()
makegrub.setInstallKernel('kickstart/default/vmlinuz-&version;-&arch;') makegrub.setInstallRamdisk('kickstart/default/initrd.img-&version;-&arch;')
args = 'build ksdevice=eth1 lang= devfs=nomount ekv central=%s ' \ 'ip=%s gateway=%s netmask=%s dns=%s selinux=0 dropcert' \ % ( '&Kickstart_PublicKickstartHost;', '&Kickstart_PublicAddress;', '&Kickstart_PublicGateway;', '&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;', '&Kickstart_PublicDNSServers;'.split(',')[0])
makegrub.run(args)
